import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { LoginComponent } from 'src/app/views/login/login.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.css'] }) export class NavComponent { isMostrarMenu: boolean = false; hora = ("00" + new Date().getHours()).slice(-2) + ":" + ("00" + new Date().getMinutes()).slice(-2); data = ("00" + new Date().getDate()).slice(-2) + "/" + ("00" + new Date().getMonth()).slice(-2) + "/" + new Date().getFullYear() + " - " + this.hora; ngOnInit(){ this.loginComponent.isMostrarMenu.subscribe( mostrar => {this.isMostrarMenu = mostrar;console.log('mostrar');} ) } constructor(private loginComponent: LoginComponent) { this.isMostrarMenu = this.loginComponent.isMostrarMenu.g; } }
